channel.title: taichi on Long Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in taichi on Long Thoughts

item.title: Tai Chi & Me after 4 Years
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Early 2019 I joined a local Tai Chi school in Hamburg. After 4 years of weekly practice in an unusual sport, the time has come for a pivot. The time has come for reflections.

item.title: Martial Art Knowledge: Tai Chi
item.author: long.thoughts.blog@googlemail.com (Felix)
item.description: Getting by Tai Chi knowledge is not so easy. Most teachers (of the far east) are stingy with their knowledge. But it is a dying martial art, so the knowledge is slowly forgotten. And not everybody has such amount of time to learn. So let me share the best learning resources I know.
